Name: Overcaution
Desc: Upon entering the next floor and starting the final battle, lose 300 Gear Coins and recover 10% of Max HP for all squad members. However, failure to pay will immediately deduct 15% Max HP from all squad members.
Desc2: Caution becomes a feeble pretext for the fear of moving forward, urging one to pursue an illusory path of safety amid the Hollow's malevolence.
